main_definition: Drums refer to the musical instruments consisting of a set of drums, or it can also be an idiom representing repetitive actions or tasks.

meanings_and_examples.example: The band played lively tunes on their bass drum and snare.
I've been hitting the books to drums since I started studying for my exams, trying to memorize everything.
The sound of thunder was like drums crashing in the sky during the storm.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of drums played together
meanings_and_examples.example: The percussion section included a variety of drums, creating an impressive rhythm.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Work or duties that require continuous effort
meanings_and_examples.example: His job was like hitting the drums non-stop during his shift at the factory.
